description: Formerly a member, I now serve as the Lead of the Mobile Development SIG at RISTEK Fasilkom UI, Indonesia's largest and coolest IT student organization.

description: Teaching Assistant of Database (CSGE602070) Course at Fasilkom UI. Responsible for assisting the lecturer in teaching and grading assignments.
